title: A unified theory of fucks. “Give a fuck about yourself, about your...
content:
A unified theory of fucks. “Give a fuck about yourself, about your own wild and tender spirit, about your peace and especially about your art. Give every last fuck you have to living things with beating hearts and breathing lungs and open eyes…” (via swiss-miss.com)

💬 Join the discussion on kottke.org →
author: Jason Kottke
